bwwExcerpt: This strange family drama lacks a cohesive plot and lingers on endlessly for about 90 minutes. Its unusual crew of characters includes an academic (Brian F. O'Byrne), a tough teacher (Michelle Gomez), an overweight bullied teen (Annie Funke) and her heartfelt but idiotic uncle (Gyllenhaal)â€¦Gyllenhaal easily blends into his heartbroken, thick-accented character, while Funke presents an often harrowing portrait of a lonely and emotionally abused girl. But if there was a point to "If There Is ...,"
